name: Content XLerator WP Public Plugin
author: Tim Gallaugher

sections.description:
A wordpress plugin to support integration with the cxl1.net API for content submission, distribution, and playback

Supported Languages

  • US English/en_US (default)
sections.installation:
1. Unzip archive to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Custom integration with cxl1.net Manage notification and display settings for posts received via xmlrpc. Custom forms for submitting content to the wp …
description:
A wordpress plugin to support integration with the cxl1.net API for content submission, distribution, and playback

Supported Languages

  • US English/en_US (default)
